name: New Hire Onboarding - Process Tracking Spreadsheet
description: When there is a trigger on a specified schedule, do action

code.name: scheduled_event
code.description: Trigger every 1 days at 12:00:00 PM

extended_input_schema.name: trigger_every
extended_input_schema.label: Trigger every
extended_input_schema.hint:
Define repeating schedule. Enter whole numbers only.
                        This field can be set to a minimum of 5 minutes.

extended_input_schema.name: trigger_at
extended_input_schema.label: Trigger at
extended_input_schema.hint: Set a time to schedule the job.

extended_input_schema.name: start_after
extended_input_schema.label: Start after
extended_input_schema.hint: Set date and time to start or leave blank to start immediately. Once recipe has been run or tested, value cannot be changed.

extended_input_schema.name: timezone
extended_input_schema.label: Timezone
extended_input_schema.hint: Select the timezone to use. Leave it blank to use (GMT-08:00) Pacific Time (US & Canada)

block.name: get_entries
block.description: Get all entries from ONBOARDING_NEW_HIRES_VARIABLES lookup table
block.comment: This step is used as a placeholder to make sure the lookup table is pulled associated to the recipe under the Workato Dashboard Depency Checker

extended_input_schema.hint: Maximum number of matched rows to be returned. Minimum accepted value is 1 and maximum accepted value is 50000.

block.comment: Search through the referenced New Hire Onboarding Spreadsheet .. Pulling down all

block.name: declare_variable
block.title: Create variables Row_Number, Perferred_Name, Personal_Email, Start_Date, Workday_ID
block.description: Create variables Row_Number, Perferred_Name, Personal_Email, Start_Date, Workday_ID

properties.label: Row_Number
properties.name: row_number
properties.hint: Defaults to nil if not supplied.

properties.label: Perferred_Name
properties.name: perferred_name
properties.hint: Defaults to nil if not supplied.

properties.label: Personal_Email
properties.name: personal_email
properties.hint: Defaults to nil if not supplied.

properties.label: Start_Date
properties.name: start_date
properties.hint: Defaults to nil if not supplied.

properties.label: Workday_ID
properties.name: workday_id
properties.hint: Defaults to nil if not supplied.

block.comment: Store High Level Variables that can be passed into the following recipe

block.name: call_service_async
block.description: Call recipe Callable: Process New Hire from New Hire Tracking Sheet (do not wait for response)

dynamicPickListSelection.flow_id: Callable: Process New Hire from New Hire Tracking Sheet

flow_id.name: Callable: New Hire Onboarding - Process New Hire from GSheet

block.comment: This callable recipe will process a single employee from the spreadsheet

block.name: update_variable

extended_input_schema.name: value
extended_input_schema.label: Value
extended_input_schema.hint:
Provide a value for the variable. When the value is not supplied, the variable is not updated.
To clear the value, set the value to nil in formula mode.

block.comment: This variable is used to store the number of people processed from the Google Sheet
Loop through all the employees from the Google Spreadsheet where the automation flag is set to TRUE

input.stop_reason: There were no people processed from the Tracking Sheet. There might have been a change on the sheet that needs to be addressed.

block.comment: FAIL MESSAGE:: There were no people processed from the Tracking Sheet. There might have been a change on the sheet that needs to be addressed.
This is added in to make sure that if there are any changes to the columns an error is thrown and the changes can be addressed accordingly

block.name: call_service
block.description: Call recipe Callable: New Hire Onboarding - Post Error to Slack Channel

dynamicPickListSelection.flow_id: Callable: New Hire Onboarding - Slack Channel Error

flow_id.name: Callable: New Hire Onboarding - Post Error to Slack Channel

block.comment: Use this callable recipe to send a message to the associated Slack Channel for error mitigation
Stop the job with the associated job error
Retry failed jobs 3 times to make sure timeout errors are caught and a retry is attempted
